alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Boyle; Garrard; Jessamine; Marion; Mercer; Washington; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 8:28PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mercer, southern Woodford, northwestern Garrard, east central Anderson, east central Marion, western Jessamine, southeastern Washington and northwestern Boyle Counties through 900 PM EST... At 828 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Springfield, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harrodsburg around 845 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Nicholasville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Boyle; Garrard; Jessamine; Marion; Mercer; Washington; Woodford
